_gram:
({#Bajati-te#} but usually
<ab>Atm.</ab> only; {#baBAja, Beje, aBAkzIt, aBakta#},
{#BakzyAti-te, Bakta#})
_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) To share, 
distribute, divide; {#Bajeran pEtfkaM rikTaM#}
<ls>Ms. 9. 104</ls>; {#na tatputrErmajetsArDaM#} <ls n="Ms. 9.">209</ls>,
<ls n="Ms. 9.">119.</ls> ({%b%}) To assign, allot, 
apportion; {#gAyatrImagnaye'Bajat#} <ls>Ait. Br.</ls>

{@--3@} To accept, receive;  
<ls>Māl. 5. 25.</ls>

{@--7@} To
adore, honour, worship (as a god).
{@--9@} To enjoy carnally; <ls>Pt. 4. 50.</ls>

{@--10@} To be attached or devoted to;
<ls>Pt. 1. 35.</ls>

{@--11@} To take possession
of.

{@--12@} To fall to the lot of any
one.
{@--13@} To grant, bestow.

{@--14@} To
supply, furnish (<ab>Ved.</ab>).

{@--15@} To
favour.

{@--16@} To decide in favour of,
declare for.

{@--17@} To love, court
(affection).

{@--18@} To apply oneself
to, be engaged in.

{@--19@} To cook,
dress (food).

{@--20@} To employ, 
engage. (The meanings of this root
are variously modified according to
the noun with which it is 
connected: {%--<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#nidrAM Baj#} to go to sleep;
{#mUrCAM Baj#} to swoon; {#BAvaM Baj#} to
show love for &c. &c.).

{@--1@}
To divide.

{@--2@} To put to flight, 

pursue.
{@--3@} To cook, dress.

, regarded by some as
the {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} of {#Baj#} I
{@--1@} To cook.

{@--2@} To
give.
